sqlMap.select: SELECT A.YEAR , A.EVAL_USER_GRP_ID , A.EVAL_USER_GRP_NM , A.CONTENT , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM BSC_AHP_EVAL_USER B WHERE B.YEAR = A.YEAR AND A.EVAL_USER_GRP_ID = B.EVAL_USER_GRP_ID) USER_CNT , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM BSC_AHP_EVAL_MAPPING B WHERE B.YEAR = A.YEAR AND A.EVAL_USER_GRP_ID = B.EVAL_USER_GRP_ID) MEM_CNT , A.SORT_ORDER FROM BSC_AHP_EVAL_USER_GRP A WHERE A.YEAR = #findYear# ORDER BY A.SORT_ORDER
SELECT YEAR , EVAL_USER_GRP_ID , EVAL_USER_GRP_NM , CONTENT , SORT_ORDER FROM BSC_AHP_EVAL_USER_GRP WHERE 1 = 1 AND YEAR = #year# AND EVAL_USER_GRP_ID = #evalUserGrpId#
